nodes.name: IErc20
IErc20

devdoc.author: dYdX * Interface for using ERC20 Tokens. We have to use a special interface to call ERC20 functions so that we don't automatically revert when calling non-compliant tokens that have no return value for transfer(), transferFrom(), or approve().
devdoc.title: IErc20
